TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了一些方法，以 SOAP 格式使用和發行遠端物件。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects in SOAP format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別可讓連結要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。A security exception is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的成員類別之間進行轉換物件和 XML 類型。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XML type. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#100)]

permission.span: 針對使用基礎結構程式碼執行作業。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.

permission.span: 要求值： ;權限的值：

span.span: Demand value: ; Permission Value:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的方法在.NET Framework 和 SoapSuds 工具來建立 common language runtime 物件類型的 XML 命名空間名稱。The current method is used by the .NET Framework and the SoapSuds tool to create an XML namespace name for a common language runtime object type. 如需 SoapSuds 的詳細資訊，請參閱[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))。For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#101)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#101)]

span.span: if the namespace and assembly names were successfully decoded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當.NET Framework 會剖析 XML 資料流時，它必須了解如何將 XML 從資料流讀取至 common language runtime 類型。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 指定.NET Framework 應如何產生的資訊和剖析 XML 資料流儲存在自訂屬性，位於命名空間。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 若要在組態檔中指定這項資訊的兩種方式： 藉由明確地指定對應，或藉由指定要預先載入的物件型別。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 目前的方法支援這種對應擷取。The current method supports the retrieval of such mappings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#102)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#102)]

param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，含有存有欄位名稱的 。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 從 XML 屬性名稱、命名空間和包含物件的 ，擷取欄位型別。

span.span: Retrieves field type from XML attribute name, namespace, and the of the containing object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定包含物件的 XML 屬性和.NET Framework 所讀取的 XML 命名空間的類型，目前的方法會傳回實際 common language runtime 欄位名稱和欄位類型。Given the type of the containing object and the XML attribute and XML namespace that is read in by the .NET Framework, the current method returns the actual common language runtime field name and type of the field. 然後，在.NET Framework 會使用此資訊來以從 XML 資料流讀取的資料填入該欄位。The .NET Framework then uses this information to populate that field with the data read in from the XML stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks SoapSuds 工具會使用目前的方法，來判斷 XML 命名空間從非通用語言執行階段系統是否表示 common language runtime 型別或型別。The current method is used by the SoapSuds tool to determine whether an XML namespace represents a common language runtime type or a type from a non-common language runtime system. 如需 SoapSuds 的詳細資訊，請參閱[Soapsuds 工具 (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100))。For more information about SoapSuds, see [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xd176a6c(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當.NET Framework 會剖析 XML 資料流時，它必須了解如何將 XML 從資料流讀取至 common language runtime 類型。When the .NET Framework is parsing an XML stream, it needs to know how to convert the XML read from the stream into common language runtime types. 指定.NET Framework 應如何產生的資訊和剖析 XML 資料流儲存在自訂屬性，位於命名空間。The information that specifies how the .NET Framework should generate and parse an XML stream is stored in custom attributes that are located in the namespace. 若要在組態檔中指定這項資訊的兩種方式： 藉由明確地指定對應，或藉由指定要預先載入的物件型別。There are two ways to specify this information in a configuration file: either by explicitly specifying the mappings, or by specifying which object types to preload. 預先載入程序期間讀取自訂屬性，這些資訊並可供 SOAP 剖析器。The custom attributes are read during the preloading process and the information in them is made available to the SOAP parser. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含指定之方法的 SOAPAction屬性，或從網路讀取。The SOAPAction of the specified method is contained in the property, or is read off the wire. 目前的方法產生關聯的 SOAPAction用於通道接收。The current method associates the SOAPAction with the for use in channel sinks. SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位指出的 SOAP HTTP 要求的目的。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. 值是用來識別目的的 URI。The value is a URI identifying the intent. SOAP 格式或特定 URI 上將沒有限制，或它是可解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. HTTP 用戶端發出 SOAP HTTP 要求時，必須使用此標頭欄位。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#170)]

span.span: Associates the provided SOAPAction value with the given for use in channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位指出的 SOAP HTTP 要求的目的。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. 值是用來識別目的的 URI。The value is a URI identifying the intent. SOAP 格式或特定 URI 上將沒有限制，或它是可解析。SOAP places no restrictions on the format or specificity of the URI or that it is resolvable. HTTP 用戶端發出 SOAP HTTP 要求時，必須使用此標頭欄位。An HTTP client must use this header field when issuing a SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示如何使用這個方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CPP/demo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.SoapServices/CS/demo.cs#170)]

span.span: The XML namespace prefix for common language runtime types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 與 SOAP 通訊協定會將 common language runtime 類別編碼為 XML 命名空間。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 目前的屬性會指定 XML 命名空間的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 所有的 XML 命名空間的 common language runtime 類別開頭傳回目前的屬性。All XML namespaces for a common language runtime class start with the that the current property returns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得預設 XML 命名空間前置詞，其應該使用於擁有組件但是沒有原生命名空間的 Common Language Runtime 類別的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Gets the default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.

value.span: 預設 XML 命名空間前置詞，其應該使用於擁有組件但是沒有原生命名空間的 Common Language Runtime 類別的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: The default XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that has an assembly, but no native namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 與 SOAP 通訊協定會將 common language runtime 類別編碼為 XML 命名空間。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 目前的屬性會指定 XML 命名空間的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果 common language runtime 類別的組件但是沒有命名空間，目前的屬性會傳回使用預設 XML 命名空間。If a common language runtime class has an assembly but no namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得 XML 命名空間前置詞，其應該使用於為 mscorlib.dll 檔案一部分的 Common Language Runtime 類別的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Gets the XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

value.span: XML 命名空間前置詞，應該使用於為 mscorlib.dll 檔案一部分的 Common Language Runtime 類別的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: The XML namespace prefix that should be used for XML encoding of a common language runtime class that is part of the mscorlib.dll file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 與 SOAP 通訊協定會將 common language runtime 類別編碼為 XML 命名空間。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 目前的屬性會指定 XML 命名空間的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果通用語言執行階段類別是 mscorlib 組件的一部分，則會使用目前的屬性所傳回的 XML 命名空間。If a common language runtime class is part of the mscorlib assembly, the XML namespace returned by the current property is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks WSDL 與 SOAP 通訊協定會將 common language runtime 類別編碼為 XML 命名空間。WSDL and SOAP protocols encode common language runtime classes into XML namespaces. 目前的屬性會指定 XML 命名空間的格式。The current property specifies the format for the XML namespaces. 如果 common language runtime 類別的組件和 common language runtime 命名空間，目前的屬性會傳回使用預設 XML 命名空間。If a common language runtime class has an assembly and a common language runtime namespace, the current property returns the default XML namespace that is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example shows how to use this property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
